data.comment: The match is underway at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Strasbourg's Habib Diallo has been booked in Reims.
In the minute 12, Free kick Strasbourg.
Strasbourg's Habib Diallo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
In the minute 16, Reims's Nathanael Mbuku is on target but unsuccessful.
Reims have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Reims.
Fode Doucoure for Reims drives towards goal at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Reims's Thomas Foket misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 19, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
In the minute 20, Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal! Reims have got their heads in front thanks to a Bingourou Kamara strike.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Reims in the half of Strasbourg.
Reims are pushing forward but Kaj Sierhuis's finish is wide of the goal.
Strasbourg have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 26, Corner awarded to Reims.
In the minute 26, Reims move into a more comfortable 2-0 lead. Wout Faes is the scorer with a header!
Valon Berisha with an assist there.
Strasbourg have a dangerous throw-in.
An attacking Strasbourg player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 30, Strasbourg are back in the match in Reims. A Ludovic Ajorque penalty has made the score 2-1.
Marshall Munetsi for Reims gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Strasbourg at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 35, Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Reims's half?
Eric Wattellier awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, Eric Wattellier awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 45, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over.
The second-half is underway in Reims.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Reims in their own half.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In the minute 48, Strasbourg needs to be cautious. Reims have an attacking throw-in.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Eric Wattellier awards the home team a throw-in.
Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 51, Strasbourg are coming forward and Jeanricner Bellegarde gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Reims.
Eric Wattellier signals a Reims throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Reims.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 56, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Reims in their own half.
In the minute 58, Strasbourg have a goal kick.
Adrien Thomasson is replacing Lionel Carole for the away team.
Throw-in Reims.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Reims territory.
In the minute 60, Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Reims.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Reims.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
In the minute 63, Reims awarded a free kick in their own half.
Strasbourg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Reims's half?
In the minute 64, Strasbourg's Jeanricner Bellegarde gets in a shot on goal at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Eric Wattellier awards the home team a throw-in.
Eric Wattellier signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Reims's half.
In the minute 66, The home team have replaced Mathieu Cafaro with Moussa Doumbia. This is the first substitution made today by David Guion.
Reims make their second substitution with El Bilal Toure replacing Kaj Sierhuis.
In Reims Strasbourg attack through Sanjin Prcic. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Reims goal kick.
Reims's Moussa Doumbia breaks free at Stade Auguste Delaune. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Eric Wattellier awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Ball safe as Reims is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Free kick for Reims in their own half.
In the minute 72, Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
In Reims a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At Stade Auguste Delaune, Sanjin Prcic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Strasbourg goal kick.
Goal kick for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Thierry Laurey (Strasbourg) is making a second substitution, with Lucien Kevin Zohi replacing Ibrahima Sissoko.
In the minute 76, Majeed Waris is replacing Sanjin Prcic for Strasbourg at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Boulaye Dia gets his shot on target but fails to score for Reims.
In the minute 77, It's a goal kick for the away team in Reims.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Dereck Kutesa is on a sub for Nathanael Mbuku for Reims.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Reims in their own half.
Throw-in Strasbourg.
Reims awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 82, Eric Wattellier signals a throw-in for Strasbourg, close to Reims's area.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
In Reims Strasbourg drive forward through Habib Diallo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Reims in the half of Strasbourg.
Can Reims get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
Eric Wattellier signals a Reims throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
In the minute 86, Free kick Strasbourg.
Reims have a goal kick.
The home team replace Boulaye Dia with Mouhamadou Drammeh.
In the minute 88, Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Reims.
Throw-in for Strasbourg at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Eric Wattellier signals a free kick to Strasbourg in their own half.
In the minute 89, Eric Wattellier awards Reims a goal kick.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Reims to take a throw-in in Strasbourg territory.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Throw-in for Reims at Stade Auguste Delaune.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Eric Wattellier.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Reims.
Full-time! The final score is 2-1.
